mapper.sql: eval_id, eval_context, eval_level, res_id, res_type, user_id, create_time, update_by, update_time, eval_status, standby1, standby2
mapper.insert:
insert into busi_resources_eval
eval_id,
eval_context,
eval_level,
res_id,
res_type,
user_id,
create_time,
update_by,
update_time,
eval_status,
standby1,
standby2,
#{evalId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{evalContext,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{evalLevel,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{resId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{resType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{updateBy,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{evalStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{standby1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{standby2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mapper.update:
update busi_resources_eval
eval_context = #{evalContext,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
eval_level = #{evalLevel,jdbcType=INTEGER},
res_id = #{resId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
res_type = #{resType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_by = #{updateBy,jdbcType=INTEGER},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
eval_status = #{evalStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
standby1 = #{standby1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
standby2 = #{standby2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where eval_id = #{evalId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update busi_resources_eval set eval_context = #{evalContext,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, eval_level = #{evalLevel,jdbcType=INTEGER}, res_id = #{resId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, res_type = #{resType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_by = #{updateBy,jdbcType=INTEGER}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, eval_status = #{evalStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, standby1 = #{standby1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, standby2 = #{standby2,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where eval_id = #{evalId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
SELECT t1.eval_id AS evalId, t1.eval_context As evalContext, t1.res_id AS resId, t1.eval_level AS evalLevel, t1.res_type AS resType, t1.user_id AS userId, t1.create_time AS createTime, t1.eval_status AS evalStatus, t2.nickname AS nickName, t2.username AS userName, t2.headimgurl AS headimgUrl FROM busi_resources_eval t1 LEFT JOIN busi_user t2 ON t2.user_id = t1.user_id WHERE t1.eval_status != 2
and t1.res_id = #{resId}
and t2.nickname like CONCAT('%', #{nickName},'%')
and DATE_FORMAT(t1.create_time, '%Y-%m-%d')>= DATE_FORMAT(#{beginDate}, '%Y-%m-%d')
and DATE_FORMAT(t1.create_time, '%Y-%m-%d') <= DATE_FORMAT(#{endDate}, '%Y-%m-%d')
and t1.res_type = "YL"
and t1.res_type = "SP"
ORDER BY t1.create_time desc

SELECT t1.eval_id AS evalId, t1.eval_context As evalContext, t1.res_id AS resId, t1.eval_level AS evalLevel, t1.res_type AS resType, t1.user_id AS userId, t1.create_time AS createTime, t2.nickname AS nickName, t2.username AS userName, t2.headimgurl AS headimgUrl FROM busi_resources_eval t1 LEFT JOIN busi_user t2 ON t2.user_id = t1.user_id WHERE t1.eval_status = 1 AND t1.res_id = #{sayId} AND t1.res_type = 'YL' ORDER BY t1.create_time DESC
mapper.update:
update busi_resources_eval set
eval_status = '1'
eval_status = '2'
where eval_id in
#{item}
mapper.select: SELECT AVG(eval_level) FROM busi_resources_eval WHERE res_id =#{videoAudioId} AND res_type=#{videoAudioType}

SELECT t1.eval_id AS evalId, t1.eval_context As evalContext, t1.res_id AS resId, t1.eval_level AS evalLevel, t1.res_type AS resType, t1.user_id AS userId, t1.create_time AS createTime, t1.eval_status AS evalStatus, t2.nickname AS nickName, t2.username AS userName, t2.headimgurl AS headimgUrl FROM busi_resources_eval t1 LEFT JOIN busi_user t2 ON t2.user_id = t1.user_id WHERE t1.eval_status != 2
and t1.res_id = #{resId}
and t2.nickname like CONCAT('%', #{nickName},'%')
and DATE_FORMAT(t1.create_time, '%Y-%m-%d')>= DATE_FORMAT(#{beginDate}, '%Y-%m-%d')
and DATE_FORMAT(t1.create_time, '%Y-%m-%d') <= DATE_FORMAT(#{endDate}, '%Y-%m-%d')
and t1.res_type = "YL"
and t1.res_type = "SP"
ORDER BY t1.create_time desc

SELECT t1.eval_id AS evalId, t1.eval_context As evalContext, t1.res_id AS resId, t1.eval_level AS evalLevel, t1.res_type AS resType, t1.user_id AS userId, t1.create_time AS createTime, t1.eval_status AS evalStatus, t2.nickname AS nickName, t2.username AS userName, t2.headimgurl AS headimgUrl FROM busi_resources_eval t1 LEFT JOIN busi_user t2 ON t2.user_id = t1.user_id WHERE t1.eval_status = 1
and t1.res_id = #{resId}
and t2.nickname like CONCAT('%', #{nickName},'%')
and DATE_FORMAT(t1.create_time, '%Y-%m-%d')>= DATE_FORMAT(#{beginDate}, '%Y-%m-%d')
and DATE_FORMAT(t1.create_time, '%Y-%m-%d') <= DATE_FORMAT(#{endDate}, '%Y-%m-%d')
and t1.res_type = "YL"
and t1.res_type = "SP"
ORDER BY t1.create_time desc
